items.title: Login Page with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

items.title: Responsive Portfolio Website

items.title: E-commerce Website
items.description: An e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features product listings, a shopping cart, and user authentication.
